title: Market efficiency good z deadweight loss

content.question: The market for Good Z has relatively elastic supply and demand curves. Market efficiency is attained when

choices.label: total labor cost is minimized for each firm
each firm experiences economies of scale
consumer surplus is greater than producer surplus

topic.text: 2.6: Market Equilibrium and Consumer and Producer Surplus

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Using economic concepts, principles, or models, explain how a specific economic outcome occurs, or what action should be taken in order to achieve a specific economic outcome.
